spatial_accuracy.notes: General room placement is correct, but door and window layouts deviate significantly. The main entrance door in the 3D model is single-leaf and solid, whereas the plan indicates a double-leaf transparent entrance. Multiple windows in the kitchen and dining areas are incorrectly sized or shifted.

structural_fidelity.notes: The wash area and toilet partitions are present but incorrectly joined to the hallway. The staircase geometry is inverted (stairs should go up relative to the landing, not down into a pit). Hallucinated doors added to the toilet/wash area that do not match the swing paths of the blueprint.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture mapping is highly accurate to the plan's icons, including the dining table configuration, bedroom layout, and living room seating group.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent render quality with consistent wall thickness, clean orthographic-style projection, and soft, realistic ambient lighting. Geometry is sharp and professional.

detected_errors.description: Main entrance door is simplified to a single solid door instead of the specified double-leaf glass/transparent entry.
Staircase orientation error: the stair run from the landing goes in the wrong direction relative to the 'UP' indicator.
Window in Bedroom 1 is misplaced and lacks the wide frame shown in the 2D technical drawing.
Hallucinated exterior door at the bottom of the floor plan near the wash area/staircase junction.
Kitchen sink and counter layout mirrored or shifted compared to the plumbing wall indicated in the source plan.
